column4: does anyone here uses a 32bit ubuntu whit more than 4GB of ram? does the PAE mode work fine? im wondering about adding more ram to my machine but i don't want to move to a 64bit install
i have 32 gigs f ram in my 32 bit server and it uses and sees it all
yea we have another server with 64 gigs but i don't use that one much its not mine I just do upkeep on it. But it seems to run fine
